nml_option.name: config_AM_ridgingDiagnostics_enable
nml_option.description: If true, ocean analysis member ridgingDiagnostics is called.

nml_option.name: config_AM_ridgingDiagnostics_compute_interval
nml_option.description: Timestamp determining how often analysis member computation should be performed.

nml_option.name: config_AM_ridgingDiagnostics_output_stream
nml_option.description: Name of the stream that the ridgingDiagnostics analysis member should be tied to.

nml_option.name: config_AM_ridgingDiagnostics_compute_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member computation occurs on start-up.

nml_option.name: config_AM_ridgingDiagnostics_write_on_startup
nml_option.description: Logical flag determining if an analysis member write occurs on start-up.

package.name: ridgingDiagnosticsAMPKG
package.description: This package includes variables required for the ridgingDiagnostics analysis member.
